display_long_description:
TRANSFORM YOUR HOME INTO A BATTLEFIELD Your entire house is no longer safe. Soldiers, robots, and drones invade your physical space in this fast-paced Mixed Reality shooter game. Your walls, furniture, and hallways become the level!

[media]

⚔️ CHOOSE YOUR SCANNING TECH

- Custom In-Game Scanner (Quest 3, 3s Only): A fast, experimental tool to scan your room then and jump straight into the action!  (Supporting Basic Survival Mode)
[media]


- Meta Scene System:  Uses your headset's native room data. Enemies take tactical cover behind your real furniture. Required for multi-room play. Your experience evolves with the quality of your room scans and how well you map your environment. (Supports Mission Mode, and Other Advanced Game Modes)
[media]

🔥 CONTENT PACKED

- 4 Game Modes: Including infinite Survival and objective-based challenges.

- Mission Mode: Complete 12+ unique missions to unlock gear.

- Massive Arsenal: 20+ weapons including tactical rifles, miniguns, and a flamethrower that scorches your real furniture.

[media]

🥽 Effects and Destruction!
[media]
[media]

⚠️ SETUP & TRACKING

Crucial: During Meta Scene Setup, delete doors leading outside your play area to ensure enemies spawn correctly. Scan each room make make sure they all connect!

If you notice problems, restart  headset, clear Guardian history in headset settings, rescan your space. These are Headset issues not the app.

🤝 SUPPORT Need help? Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/53d4NQnDE9

🚀 SOLO DEV PROJECT Built by one person! Please leave a review to support future updates.
